item.title: For the fourth year in a row, Konica Minolta has been awarded the prestigious BLI 'Line of the Year' award
item.description: Buyers Laboratory (BLI), a recognized independent evaluator for the imaging industry, has given Konica Minolta’s A3 multifunction printer (MFP) family its “Line of the Year” award for an unprecedented fourth consecutive year. The “Line of the Year” award is presented annually to companies whose products demonstrate exceptional performance in BLI’s rigorous two-month laboratory assessments. “Konica Minolta’s success comes down to consistency,” said George Mikolay, BLI’s Senior Product Editor for A3/Copier MFPs.
